abstract: Carl C. Icahn, who sharply criticized Yahoo a year ago for rejecting Microsoft’s advances, told BusinessWeek that he supported last week’s Web search deal between the two technology companies.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, who sharply criticized Yahoo a year ago for rejecting Microsoft’s advances, told BusinessWeek that he supported last week’s Web search deal between the two technology companies.
lead_paragraph: There seems to be at least one investor who is happy with Yahoo’s decision last week to enter into a 10-year Web search deal with Microsoft: Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Icahn Gives Thumbs Up to Yahoo-Microsoft Deal
